channel.title: Development on Juha.TL

item.title: New personal site with Hugo
item.description: My previous personal site was built with Elixir and Phoenix. While I still love the BEAM ecosystem, it didn’t really make much sense to host a completely static website on top of Phoenix (and pay for the associated server costs). I’m still very actively working with Phoenix, but for my personal little corner of the web, I wanted to go with something simpler. After a small time of contemplation, I picked Hugo.
